description: Detailed diagnostics view for a single LiteLLM request trace. Use the Trace Id variable to load a specific call and analyze its end-to-end behavior including spans, token usage, model details, completion output, and the full prompt conversation. Data is sourced from Azure Application Insights via the Azure Monitor datasource.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where name == "litellm_request"
| extend request_route = tostring(customDimensions.["metadata.user_api_key_request_route"])
| extend gen_ai_request_model = tostring(customDimensions.["gen_ai.request.model"])
| extend gen_ai_system = tostring(customDimensions.["gen_ai.system"])
| extend gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens = tostring(customDimensions.["gen_ai.usage.completion_tokens"])
| extend gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens = tostring(customDimensions.["gen_ai.usage.prompt_tokens"])
| extend llm_usage_total_tokens = toint(customDimensions.["llm.usage.total_tokens"])
| project timestamp, model=gen_ai_request_model, request_route, duration, Token=llm_usage_total_tokens, TraceId=operation_Id
| order by timestamp desc

panels.description: Summarized request details and LLM output for the trace. Shows model name, total tokens, and the first completion content with its finish reason. Data is derived from dependencies where name == "litellm_request" filtered by the selected Trace Id.

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where name == "litellm_request"
// optional filter, keep/remove as needed
| where operation_Id == "$litellmTraceId"
| extend cd = customDimensions
| extend gen_ai_request_model = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.request.model"])
     , gen_ai_system = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.system"])
     , gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens = toint(cd.["gen_ai.usage.completion_tokens"])
     , gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens = toint(cd.["gen_ai.usage.prompt_tokens"])
     , llm_usage_total_tokens = toint(cd.["llm.usage.total_tokens"])
     , completion_content = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.content"])
     , completion_finish_reason = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.finish_reason"])
     , completion_role = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.role"])
     , customDimensions_str = tostring(cd)
// expand prompt keys
| mv-expand k = bag_keys(cd)
| extend k_str = tostring(k)
| extend v = tostring(cd[k_str])
| where k_str matches regex @"^gen_ai\.prompt\.(\d+)\.(role|content)$"
| extend index = toint(extract(@"^gen_ai\.prompt\.(\d+)\.", 1, k_str))
| extend field = extract(@"^gen_ai\.prompt\.\d+\.(role|content)$", 1, k_str)
// one object per prompt index
| summarize prompt_obj = make_bag(pack(field, v))
    by timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
       gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
       completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
       index, customDimensions_str
| project timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
          gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
          completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
          customDimensions_str,
          index,
          role   = tostring(prompt_obj.role),
          content= tostring(prompt_obj.content)
// regroup prompts per request
| summarize prompts = make_list(pack("index", index, "role", role, "content", content))
    by timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
       gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
       completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
       customDimensions_str
// count and build body markdown
| extend promptCount = array_length(prompts)
| mv-apply p = prompts on (
    order by toint(p.index) asc
    | extend line = strcat("**#", tostring(p.index), " [", tostring(p.role), "]**:\n\n", tostring(p.content))
    | summarize bodyMarkdown = strcat_array(make_list(line), "\n\n---\n\n")
)
// prepend header with total turns
| extend promptMarkdown = strcat("### Conversation (", tostring(promptCount), " turns)", "\n\n", bodyMarkdown)
// final projection
| project timestamp,
          gen_ai_request_model,
          gen_ai_system,
          gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens,
          gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens,
          llm_usage_total_tokens,
          completion_role,
          completion_finish_reason,
          completion_content,
          promptCount,
          promptMarkdown
| limit 1

panels.description: Distributed trace viewer for the selected LiteLLM request (operation_Id=$litellmTraceId). Visualizes the end-to-end span timeline including requests, dependencies, exceptions, and custom events to diagnose latency, errors, and downstream calls.
Renders the full conversation turns (role and content) extracted from gen_ai.prompt.N.* in customDimensions, ordered by index, to help review the prompt/response flow for the selected Trace Id.

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where name == "litellm_request"
// optional filter, keep/remove as needed
| where operation_Id == "$litellmTraceId"
| extend cd = customDimensions
| extend gen_ai_request_model = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.request.model"])
     , gen_ai_system = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.system"])
     , gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens = toint(cd.["gen_ai.usage.completion_tokens"])
     , gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens = toint(cd.["gen_ai.usage.prompt_tokens"])
     , llm_usage_total_tokens = toint(cd.["llm.usage.total_tokens"])
     , completion_content = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.content"])
     , completion_finish_reason = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.finish_reason"])
     , completion_role = tostring(cd.["gen_ai.completion.0.role"])
     , customDimensions_str = tostring(cd)
// expand prompt keys
| mv-expand k = bag_keys(cd)
| extend k_str = tostring(k)
| extend v = tostring(cd[k_str])
| where k_str matches regex @"^gen_ai\.prompt\.(\d+)\.(role|content)$"
| extend index = toint(extract(@"^gen_ai\.prompt\.(\d+)\.", 1, k_str))
| extend field = extract(@"^gen_ai\.prompt\.\d+\.(role|content)$", 1, k_str)
// one object per prompt index
| summarize prompt_obj = make_bag(pack(field, v))
    by timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
       gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
       completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
       index, customDimensions_str
| project timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
          gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
          completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
          customDimensions_str,
          index,
          role   = tostring(prompt_obj.role),
          content= tostring(prompt_obj.content)
// regroup prompts per request
| summarize prompts = make_list(pack("index", index, "role", role, "content", content))
    by timestamp, gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_system,
       gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens, gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens, llm_usage_total_tokens,
       completion_content, completion_finish_reason, completion_role,
       customDimensions_str
// count and build body markdown
| extend promptCount = array_length(prompts)
| mv-apply p = prompts on (
    order by toint(p.index) asc
    | extend line = strcat("**#", tostring(p.index), " [", tostring(p.role), "]**:\n\n", tostring(p.content))
    | summarize bodyMarkdown = strcat_array(make_list(line), "\n\n---\n\n")
)
// prepend header with total turns
| extend promptMarkdown = strcat("### Conversation (", tostring(promptCount), " turns)", "\n\n", bodyMarkdown)
// final projection
| project timestamp,
          gen_ai_request_model,
          gen_ai_system,
          gen_ai_usage_prompt_tokens,
          gen_ai_usage_completion_tokens,
          llm_usage_total_tokens,
          completion_role,
          completion_finish_reason,
          completion_content,
          promptCount,
          promptMarkdown
| limit 1

list.description: Trace Id of the LLM call
list.label: Trace Id
list.name: litellmTraceId

title: LiteLLM Trace
